headline: GTA Online Update
subtitle: Introducing the Buckingham Swift
content:
For this collaboration with lifestyle brand Flying Bravo, Buckingham added rhodium stitching to the panda leather seats… and a couple of zeros to the price tag. There’s no better way to sacrifice your pay check at the altar of luxury marketing – get this special edition, light-weight, twin-engine, four-seat, multi-purpose helicopter today!

Available to purchase now from Elitastravel.com in ‘Flying Bravo’ and ‘Classic’ liveries.

Featured in the new Flight School Race ''Swift Arrival’'.
